people_also_ask.question: Is Counter-Strike free on PC?
people_also_ask.heading: A free and popular shooter game. Counter-Strike Global Offensive is one of the most popular multiplayer first-person shooter games available in the market. Designed for Windows, the free application creates an action-packed gaming environment where players die permanently if they're unable to defend themselves.
people_also_ask.title: Download Counter-Strike: Global Offensive for Windows - Free

people_also_ask.question: Can I download counter-strike for free?
people_also_ask.heading: The game isn't entirely free-to-play, though. Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is officially free to download in the Steam Store.31-Aug-2018
people_also_ask.title: You can now download CS:GO for free - Dot Esports

people_also_ask.question: Is Counter-Strike better than PUBG?
people_also_ask.heading: Advantages of PUBG over CS: GO PUBG has more weapons, more attachments, more (and bigger) maps and is simply fun-to-play. If you take your games a bit seriously, CS: GO is the ideal game for you. It has a better anti-cheat system as well. If you just want to have fun and enjoy, go for PUBG.26-Mar-2020
people_also_ask.title: Comparing PUBG and CS:GO. Which one should you play?

people_also_ask.question: Is it safe to play Counter-Strike?
people_also_ask.heading: Valve told ZDNet today that it's safe to play games like Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and Team Fortress 2 even after their source code leaked online today on 4chan and torrent sites. ... "As always, playing on the official servers is recommended for greatest security."22-Apr-2020

knowledge_panel.description: counter-strike is a series of multiplayer first-person shooter video games in which teams of terrorists battle to perpetrate an act of terror while counter-terrorists try to prevent it. the series began on windows in 1999 with the release of the first game, counter-strike. wikipedia
